3. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* Every second Thursday of the month.
* 6 p.m.
* City Hall Council Chambers  
  509 E. Crockett Street  
  Luling, TX 78648

### Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are prepared prior to each meeting, minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](http://www.cityofluling.net/AgendaCenter/City-Council-2)
